title: Senior Data Engineer
description: Designed and optimized scalable data models for retention and revenue analysis, improving data accessibility by 25% and performance insights by 30%. Automated Tableau monitoring and data governance processes, reducing manual maintenance by 80%. Implemented CI/CD in dbt with SQLFluff linting and dbt parse testing, decreasing production errors by 40%. Authored internal documentation and tutorials that cut onboarding time by 50%.

title: Data Engineer
description: Built ETL pipelines in Python and SQL processing millions of transactions daily, reducing data prep time by 40%. Improved revenue by 4–5% and recurring order approval rates by up to 5% through machine learning models optimizing transaction timing. Developed predictive models that increased retention by 8% and reduced charge declines by 15% via a Smart Dunning system.

title: Data and Machine Learning Engineer
description: Contributed to 'Orbital Atlas', a real-time space awareness platform improving threat detection accuracy by 2%. Developed Spark-based data acquisition and Python microservices to enhance system scalability and speed. Automated data pipeline routines and implemented testing to improve reliability and reduce runtime.
